    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3417</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Educació infantil</string>
            <string language="en">Nursery school education</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kindergartenausbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation d'école maternelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução da escola de berçário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione della scuola materna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκπαίδευση νηπιαγωγείων</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recull d'experiències de treball del CEIP Sant Iscle al voltant de quatre àrees:
Llenguatge, Matemàtiques, Entorn natural i social i Coneixement d'un mateix.</string>
            <string language="en">A collection of children's work from Sant Iscle Nursery School. It spans four subject areas: Language, Maths, Natural and Social Environment, and Self-Knowledge, together with comments.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">autonomia</string>
            <string language="en">autonomy</string>
            <string language="es">autonomía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">hàbit</string>
            <string language="en">habit</string>
            <string language="es">hábito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">matemàtiques</string>
            <string language="en">mathematics</string>
            <string language="es">matemáticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">prelectura</string>
            <string language="en">pre-reading</string>
            <string language="es">prelectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">preescriptura</string>
            <string language="en">pre-writing</string>
            <string language="es">preescritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències</string>
            <string language="en">sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Arbeit der Kinder vom Sant Iscle 
Kindergarten. Er überspannt vier Bereiche: Sprache, 
Mathe, natürliche und Sozialumgebung und Selbst-Wissen, zusammen mit 
Kommentar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection du travail des enfants de l'école
maternelle de Sant Iscle. Elle enjambe quatre domaines : 
Langage, maths, environnement normal et social, et 
art de l'auto-portrait-knowledge, ainsi que des commentaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção do trabalho das crianças da escola
de berçário de Sant Iscle. Mede quatro áreas sujeitas: 
Língua, maths, ambiente natural e social, e Self-Conhecimento, 
junto com comentários.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di lavoro dei bambini dalla scuola
materna di Sant Iscle. Misura quattro settori: Linguaggio,
per la matematica, ambiente naturale e sociale ed Auto-Conoscenza, 
insieme alle osservazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή της εργασίας των παιδιών από το 
νηπιαγωγείο Sant Iscle. Εκτείνεται τέσσερις θεματικές 
περιοχές: Γλώσσα, μαθηματικά, φυσικό και κοινωνικό 
περιβάλλον, και self-Knowledge, μαζί με τα σχόλια.</string>
          </description>
